title: The Game 2008 DVDRip-BiFOS_TT
description:
Release Title The Game 2008 DVDRip-BiFOS_TT (Kingdom-KvCD by Pcconsultant2007)
Release Date April 4, 2008
Release Length 01:57:02
Storyline A poor street painter, Min Hee DO meet Kang No Sik who is the first on the banking business of
Korea. Kang challenges him to a devious little game. The catch is if Hee Do loses the game, he must trade his youth to the old man in exchange for 3 billion won.

Cast 
No Character Info Available

Genre Action/Drama/Thriller
Language English/Korean
Original Source The Game 2008 DVDRip XviD-BiFOS_TT
Tracker Bandit
Video MPEG1/NTSC/352x240/29.97fps
Audio 44.1kHz/128kbps/Stereo
Size of Bin file 805 MB
Chapters Every 5 mins

This movie took me some time to do due to the fact that it is set in Korean, and there is no set release info to be found for this film. I had to take the halves of the film, join them, encode and edit, and then do the same thing for the english subs, which I basically had to put together myself. Enjoy the effort...!!! I always Burn all of my movies before I Upload...
